data.message: Thanks for being my friends Zainab Holadunny, Abdurrahman Kıybar, Adenaike Aderemi, Folashade Ramat, Abdulkadir Bello, Ismaila Omorinre, Abdulkabir Wonuola, Adenike Lipede, Ola Oyelowo, Abraham Monday Tsado, Abdullahi Lukuman, Adeniyi Bisola, Abdulwahab Sanusi, Ajiboye Jeleel, Holy Micheal, Abubakar Kolo, Afeez Salahu, Ebenezer Chukwuma, Nneoma Nelly Obi, Adebayo Adeshina Chorzby, Ademola Adedoyin, King Ji-benga, Abdul Majeed Moyosore, AbdulWasiu Awodun, AbdulRauf 'Yomi Lawal, Abidemi-Lawal Olayinka Abd'Lateef, Abdulsalam Lateef, Abdulrasheed Awolade, Engr Abdullahi Kolo, Mumini Olorire, Adeyeye Kazeem, Akeem Abiodun Balikiss, Adams Alh Liman, Arnanda Lubis, Lawal Opeyemi, Ayomide Adeshina, Opeyemi Basit, Abayomi Yormex Cool, Grace Wonuola, Abd Akeem Oluwadare Badmus, Abdulateef Abdulsalam, Abdulrasaq Oyedeji, Adam Zainab, Abdullahi Ndagi
